page.title: 04THE CLOTHES WE WEAR
page.content: For everyday wear men wear trousers, shirts or tee-shirts, jackets or jerseys, socks and shoes or boots. Women wear blouses, jumpers and skirts or trousers. For special times like going to church or to visit people men wear suits and ladies wear dresses. For sports wear players wear shorts or skirts, jerseys or tee-shirts and for swimming they wear swim suits. To protect themselves, rescue workers and firemen wear special clothing and workers wear overalls and aprons. Some people wear uniforms; e.g. airmen, soldiers, ambulance men, policemen and nurses. Written by Katie Rootham
